summary: This mod is a normal Daedric Great Sword template, with the appeal of the "Sword of Aeons"
descriptionHtml:
Since the known mod "The Sword of Aeons" has a set of attributes that commonly conflicted with my interest, i decided to make a clean version of this mod, so anyone could easily use it and/or modify it. I intentionally did not enable any enchantment, because this way you can enchant the sword with anything.

Example: I mix this weapon with the slayer enchantment from the black sacrament mod...
--PlayerEnchantObject xx001D8C D01AFDB

-----------------------------------------
[B]Version 2.0[/B]
-----------------------------------------
This version has two versions of the same weapon. One is a Great Sword for 2 handed weapon style, and the other is the same weapon, but for dual wielding. I've tested the mod, and so far, it seems to be working perfectly fine. Notify me if any bug happens.

-----------------------------------
[B]Notes:[/B]
-----------------------------------
-The armor is the "Dynasty Armor Set (Quick Fox Edition)"
-To acquire the swords, you might need to use the console commands.

------------------------------------
[B]Special Thanks:[/B]
------------------------------------
- to Jeizar designer of the sword's 3D model.
- and "rarborman", original owner of the mod "The Sword of Aeons"

------------------------------------
[B]Recommended Mods:[/B]
------------------------------------
-Better Xbox360 Controller - 8 hotkeys quicksave -load
-Dynasty Armor Set - QuickFox edition - Dynasty Armor by QuickFox v1_2 Armour
author: Alex
